title: Adobe Advertising Cloud Partner Data
description: Details related to Adobe Advertising Cloud partner data such as data associated with a segment and search and marketing partner IDs.

id.title: Search/Marketing partner ID
id.description: Internal mapping of search/marketing platforms/partners to IDs for Adobe Advertising Cloud search.

data.title: Search/Marketing partner data associated with a segment
data.description: Unique identifiers such conversion ID (in case of Google) associated with the synced segment.
